recipe_name: Warm pak choi salad with ginger and chilli dressing
author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the pak choi into a steamer and steam for five minutes, or until wilted.  Whisk the rest of the ingredients together in a small bowl to make a dressing. To serve, pile the pak choi onto a serving plate and drizzle over the dressing.
ingredients: 1 pak choi, quartered,  25g/1oz piece root ginger, peeled, finely chopped,  1 red chilli, finely chopped,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  1 orange, peeled, segmented,  3 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp fresh chopped chives,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
